      • setResultLabels

        public void setResultLabels(java.lang.String monthlyPayAmtRes,
                            java.lang.String totIntRes,
                            java.lang.String totIntPrincipalRes,
                            java.lang.String intPrincipalRatioRes,
                            java.lang.String avgIntYearRes,
                            java.lang.String avgIntMonthRes,
                            java.lang.String amortYearRes)
        Takes in all required result values from the controller, and sets them to the result labels in the CalculatorView class
        Parameters:
        monthlyPayAmtRes - Blended monthly payment amount after calculations. String.
        totIntRes - Total interest paid over the length of the mortgage after calculations. String.
        totIntPrincipalRes - Total interest and principal after calculations. String.
        intPrincipalRatioRes - Interest/principal ratio after calculations. String.
        avgIntYearRes - Average interest paid per year after calculations. String.
        avgIntMonthRes - Average interest paid per month after calculations. String.
        amortYearRes - Average interest paid per month after calculations. String.
